dmca.title: Individual complains of image use
dmca.body:
Dear Sirs: 

I wish to complain about copyright violation of a photograph stolen from my site. The photo is one that I took of myself, [private], and is posted at JeffLindsay.com. The copyright violation occurs at 
http://joinatyourownrisk.blogspot.com/2005_11_01_joinatyourownrisk_archive.html, 
where my photo is placed to suggest that I am a disaffected Mormon leader. 

The original photo, which was taken in Mexico, is posted on my Website at 
http://www.jefflindsay.com/jeff.html. 

The URL for his photo is 
http://photos1.blogger.com/blogger/3140/1627/320/1.jpg. It is currently the first image displayed at http://joinatyourownrisk.blogspot.com/. 

I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above on the allegedly infringing web page is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law. 

I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner. 

I can be reached at [private]@[private].com or [private]. 

[private]
[private]
Appleton, WI 54915
